channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: I was glad to hear that Om Malik, one of the (original) ur-bloggers, has a blogroll on his site. I was almost going to say "still" but blogrolls are now officially on their way back.
